original_text: and Beriah and Shema (they were heads of fathers' houses of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who caused the inhabitants of Gath to flee);
korean_text: 또 브리아와 세마이니 그들은 아얄론 주민의 우두머리가 되어 그들이 가드 주민을 쫓아냈더라

sentences.original_text: they were heads of fathers' houses of the inhabitants of Aijalon
who caused the inhabitants of Gath to flee
